A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This has to be by far the worst star wars movie ever even worse than the phantom menace. Ignoring all the social justice and feminist tokenism throughout the movie this was still incredibly bad. This movie completely destroys luke and leias characters by having them behave irrationally and a way in which they would never behave. For example luke coping a strop with rey at the start and also being beaten in combat by rey which is ludicrous. Leia can also survive being in a vacuum somehow\, I simply cannot suspend my disbelief in this movie. Reys character is still bad as she is impossible to connect with as she is seemingly invisible and a mary
